segments.text: May I help you find something , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm looking for an engagement ring for my girlfriend . I have an idea of what she likes , but I want to surprise her with something special , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have all shapes , sizes , qualities and price ranges , do you know about the four Cs of picking a diamond ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . Aren't the four Cs , cut , clarity , carat and color .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've got it . Tell me a little bit about what you might be wanted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , my price range is a 5,000 dollars to 7,000 dollars , I'm looking for a marquise cut on the wide band .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have good taste . Let my show you what I have .
segments.speaker: S1
